## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script target/nextflow/demux/cellranger_mkfastq/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name               | type         | description                                                            |
|:-------------------|:-------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| --input            | file         | Path to the (untarred) BCL files. Expects 'RunParameters.xml' at './'. |
| --sample_sheet     | file         | The path to the sample sheet.                                          |
| --output           | file         | The folder to store the demux results                                  |
| --separate_reports | boolean_true | Should reports be stored in a separate dir.                            |
|                    |              | Should be used with the --reports argument.                            |
| --reports          | file         | Reports directory                                                      |
| --cores            | integer      | Set max cores the pipeline may request at one time.                    |
| --memory           | integer      | Set max GB the pipeline may request at one time.                       |
